fbsql_field_table

(PHP 4 >= 4.0.6, PHP 5, PHP 7)

fbsql_field_table — Get name of the table the specified field is in

说明

fbsql_field_table ( resource $result [, int $field_offset ] ) : string

Returns the name of the table that the specified field is in.

参数

result

由 fbsql_query() 或 fbsql_db_query() 返回的结果标识符。

field_offset

The numerical offset of the field. The field index starts at 0.

返回值

Returns the name of the table, as a string.
